# include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
# define ll long long int
int main()
{
    int t,i,rem;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll k;
        cin>>k;
        vector <ll> ab;
        k--;
        while(k!=0)
        {
            rem=k%5;
            ab.push_back(rem);
            k=k/5;
        }
       // rem=ab.size();
        ll num=0;
        for(i=ab.size()-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            num=num*10+ab[i];
        }
        num=num*2;
        cout<<num<<endl;

    }
}
